item.title: Transactional currencies - Entry Credits and Gas
item.description:
Transactional currencies - Entry Credits and Gas

Working at Factom I came across an idea that seems seldom explored in the cryptocurrency space - a transactional currency called entry credits.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/19/2016 - Aiming for Channel Support Again? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 07/19/2016 - Aiming for Channel Support Again? - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be due for a test of the channel support once more, with technical indicators confirming a potential bounce. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price is still inside its ascending channel pattern after getting rejected on its attempt to break past the resistance.

item.title: Turkish Coup: Further Cause to Consider Investing in Bitcoin?
item.description:
Turkish Coup: Further Cause to Consider Investing in Bitcoin?

Was bitcoin's price spike yesterday in response to the attempted Turkish military coup? Current events continue to make the case for bitcoin as an investment, according to Orange Peel Investments, an investment firm that describes itself as "long" on bitcoin. The company contributed an opinion about bitcoin's role as an investment in Seeking Alpha.

item.title: IRC meeting summary for 2016-07-14
item.description:
IRC meeting summary for 2016-07-14

Better documentation for the -blockmaxcost option was needed, but it's been pointed out it's an awful name as users think the 'max cost' is about the monetary cost. Translators also translate it in this way. The term 'block cost' is also used in the segwit BIP, sdaftuar proposes to change the description in the BIP.

item.title: Total # of miners?
item.description:
Total # of miners?

Is there any way to find out the total no.of mining nodes in the Bitcoin network? In case of mining pools, the devices present in each pool.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Double Bottom Formation? - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - Double Bottom Formation? - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price is currently struggling against the US dollar, but as long as it is above the $10.80 level it may bounce again. Ethereum price failed to retain the bullish bias against the US Dollar and faced offers near $11.50.

item.title: Creating empty blocks vs creating full blocks
item.description:
Creating empty blocks vs creating full blocks

Yes, you are correct that miners get to decide whether to include transactions in their block that they're mining. The protocol itself doesn't force them to include any transactions. Instead, they have a financial incentive to include transactions because they can collect transaction fees and profit more.

item.title: UK Blockchain Startups Pondering Serious Move to Berlin
item.description:
UK Blockchain Startups Pondering Serious Move to Berlin

London-based blockchain startups are beginning to change their view on the entire entrepreneurial environment of the country after Brexit. On July 8, the Outlier Ventures (OV) research team published a detailed report based on their blockchain angels startup tracker to expound on the development of the United Kingdom's blockchain startups and how quickly London became the major center of open ledger and financial technology startups.
